p: Design-expert V8.0.6 was used for the experiment designs and subsequent regression analysis of the response data. Statistical analysis of the model was performed to evaluate the analysis of variance (ANOVA). The quality of the polynomial model equation was judged statistically using the coefficient of determination R 2 and adjustment R 2, and its statistical significance was determined by the F value and P value. The significance of the regression coefficients was tested by some parameters, such as coefficient of variation (CV) and adequate precision.
